nodes.excerpt: Assemble is an end-to-end project management platform for video producers and content creators. Production calendars, task lists, advanced file sharing & feedback, cloud storage and more.
nodes.title: Assemble - Project management for content creators
nodes.author: Tristan Pollock

nodes.excerpt: Smooth Hand Mockup helps you showcase your apps and services properly with animated hand mockups. It is designed to make your videos self-explanatory and engaging.
nodes.title: Smooth Hand Mockups - Create animated hand mockups and gestures for all devices
nodes.author: Ismail Mesbah

nodes.excerpt: Project Lightspeed is a self contained live streaming server. With Lightspeed you will be able to deploy your own sub-second latency streaming site. The Lightspeed repository contains the instructions for installing and deploying the entire application.
nodes.title: Project Lightspeed - a sub-second, open source, self hosted stream from OBS
nodes.author: Garrett Graves

nodes.excerpt: Struum takes the ClassPass model and applies it to streaming services. The team includes former Disney+ and Discovery exes.
nodes.title: Struum - Classpass for streaming
nodes.author: Gabe Perez

nodes.excerpt: RHTRH is an open source Chrome extension that raises your (virtual) hand on Google Meet when you raise your (physical) hand. RHTRH works with on any Chromium browsers for all organisations using Google Workspace.
nodes.title: Raise Hand To Raise Hand - Raise your hand in real life to raise your hand on Meet
nodes.author: Lorenzo Signoretti

nodes.excerpt: Laugh, talk, and cheer with friends while watching Netflix, YouTube, ESPN, and 20+ other channels and video services, like you're on a big couch togetherğŸ¿. Hearo is Multiplayer TV: simply amazing full screen, HD-quality watch parties for phone and PC. ğŸ“ºğŸ¥³
nodes.title: Hearo - Full screen watch parties with smart TV tech and voice chat.
nodes.author: Tristan Pollock

nodes.excerpt: Mindful video conferencing enhancements for increased productivity and digital wellbeing. Agenda display, guest info, graceful entries/exits, emoji & GIF sharing with an inspiring & fun interface.
nodes.title: Mindfulmeets (for Google Meet) - Add emojis/GIFs, agendas, guest info & more to Google Meet
nodes.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

nodes.excerpt: 9 QUESTIONS 24/7 Live Youtube stream quiz game. Rounds of 9 Questions. 15 seconds for each question. You can play with a team or solo. A relaxing quiz game experience. Thousands of quality questions.
nodes.title: 9 QUESTIONS - 24/7 live stream quiz game with thousands of questions.
nodes.author: Dimitris Chassapakis

nodes.excerpt: Pizazz helps you engage viewers and capture attention during video meetings in three simple steps - select a background, upload your slides and voila! Pizazz is FREE for the launch!
nodes.title: Pizazz - Virtual presentations for Zoom
nodes.author: Ido Lavi

nodes.excerpt: Choose a channel and let your mind wander with the continuous stream of videos we handpicked from the best YouTube creators. Relax with the natural images and sounds while you work, put on your TV or invite your friends to watch together.
nodes.title: Escapista - Curated videos to relax and explore the world from home.
nodes.author: Cristiano Dalbem

nodes.excerpt: Reslash is the most fun way to get together online. Recreate the feel of a Christmas party, virtually. Break away from the stress of zoom calls or the hassle of breakout rooms. It's time to celebrate and have fun this holiday season with Reslash!
nodes.title: Reslash for Christmas - Host the best virtual Christmas party ever
nodes.author: Ashwin Gupta

nodes.excerpt: Hello, would you like to book a call with technology experts? Hacker Noon started a marketplace for on demand video calls with experts in programming, cryptocurrency, ux, remote work, outer space, startups, and futurism.
nodes.title: Tech Expert Video Calls - On demand video calls with hackernoon writers
nodes.author: David Smooke

nodes.excerpt: 'Open Source Stash', the easiest way to find the best open-source alternative for design, analytics, video and more. Building something extra-ordinary need not be an expensive affair while you begin a project, start with open-source and scale gradually.
nodes.title: Open Source Stash - The best open-source alternatives for you next maker project
nodes.author: Adithya Shreshti

nodes.excerpt: Does a bad backdrop mean your video calls, virtual dates and zoom meetings are letting the team down? Is your virtual backdrop failing to impress? The Work-From-Home Backdrop installs in seconds and instantly transforms your space into a dynamic domain.
nodes.title: The Work From Home Backdrop - Physical backdrop for video calls and Zoom meetings
nodes.author: Samuel alex
